changeSet.comment: Unspecified location should be favorite location for all existing programs
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO program_favorites (entity_type, entity_id, program_uuid) SELECT DISTINCT 'LOCATION', location.locid, project.project_uuid FROM location INNER JOIN workbench.workbench_project project INNER JOIN workbench.workbench_crop crop WHERE crop.crop_name = project.crop_type AND crop.db_name = DATABASE() AND location.labbr='NOLOC' AND location.lname='Unspecified Location' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM program_favorites WHERE program_favorites.program_uuid = project.project_uuid AND program_favorites.entity_id = location.locid AND program_favorites.entity_type = 'LOCATION');
